00018 CAbout::CAbout(CExeFile &ExeFile, const std::string &type) :
00019 mp_LogoBMP(NULL),
00020 m_type(type)
00021 {
00022  mp_Scrollsurface = g_pVideoDriver->ScrollSurface;
00023  mp_Map = new CMap;
00024  mp_Map->setScrollSurface(mp_Scrollsurface);
00025  CMapLoader Maploader(mp_Map);
00026  
00027  Maploader.load(ExeFile.getEpisode(), 90, ExeFile.getDataDirectory());
00028  mp_Map->gotoPos( 1008, 28 );
00029  
00030  // Load the SDL_Bitmap
00031  if(type == "ID")
00032  {
00033   mp_bmp = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("IDLOGO");
00034   
00035   // Get the offset where in the data the info is...
00036   size_t offset = 0;
00037   //m_numberoflines = 11;
00038   switch(ExeFile.getEpisode())
00039   {
00040    case 1:
00041     if(ExeFile.getEXEVersion() == 131)
00042      offset = 0x16180-512;
00043     break;
00044    case 2:
00045     if(ExeFile.getEXEVersion() == 131)
00046      offset = 0x1A954-512;
00047     break;
00048    case 3:
00049     if(ExeFile.getEXEVersion() == 131)
00050      offset = 0x1CA70-512;
00051     break;
00052   }
00053   mp_Map->drawAll();
00054   
00055   // Read the strings and save them the string array of the class
00056   if(offset)
00057   {
00058    char *startdata;
00059    startdata = (char*)ExeFile.getRawData() + offset;
00060    std::string buf;
00061    for(int i=0 ; i<m_numberoflines ; i++)
00062    {
00063     char *data = startdata;
00064 
00065     for(short offset = 0 ; offset<0x28 ; offset++)
00066     {
00067      if(data[offset] == 0x0A && data[offset+1] == 0x00)
00068       break;
00069 
00070      buf.push_back(data[offset]);
00071     }
00072     startdata += 0x28;
00073 
00074     // now check how many new lines we have in buf
00075     size_t num_newlines = 0;
00076     bool endoftext = false;
00077 
00078     size_t  pos;
00079     if((pos = buf.find(0xFE)) != std::string::npos)
00080     {
00081      buf.erase(pos), endoftext = true;
00082     }
00083 
00084     while((pos = buf.find(0x0A)) != std::string::npos)
00085      buf.erase(pos,1), num_newlines++;
00086 
00087     while((pos = buf.find('\0')) != std::string::npos)
00088      buf.erase(pos,1);
00089 
00090     m_lines.push_back(buf);
00091     
00092     if(endoftext) break;
00093 
00094     while(num_newlines > 0)
00095      m_lines.push_back(""), num_newlines--;
00096 
00097     buf.clear();
00098    }
00099   }
00100  }
00101  else if(type == "CG")
00102  {
00103   std::string path = getResourceFilename("gfx/CGLogo.bmp", ExeFile.getDataDirectory(), true, true);
00104   mp_LogoBMP = SDL_LoadBMP(GetFullFileName(path).c_str());
00105   
00106   m_lines.push_back("Commander Genius is an interpreter");
00107   m_lines.push_back("made with the goal of recreating");
00108   m_lines.push_back("the engine that was used to power");
00109   m_lines.push_back("the Commander Keen series.");
00110   m_lines.push_back("");
00111   m_lines.push_back("However, we are also trying to add");
00112   m_lines.push_back("better support for modern systems");
00113   m_lines.push_back("to the games, so they can run more");
00114   m_lines.push_back("smoothly than they did under DOS.");
00115   m_lines.push_back("");
00116   m_lines.push_back("Thank you for supporting us by");
00117   m_lines.push_back("downloading Commander Genius and");
00118   m_lines.push_back("we hope you will report any bugs.");
00119  }
00120  
00121  switch(ExeFile.getEpisode())
00122  {
00123   case 1:
00124    // Change the ugly lower Tiles which are seen, when using 320x240 base resolution
00125    for(int i=0; i<30 ; i++)
00126    {
00127     mp_Map->changeTile(22+i, 15, 14*13);
00128     mp_Map->changeTile(22+i, 16, 14*13+3);
00129    }
00130    break;
00131  }
00132  
00133  m_logo_rect.x = m_logo_rect.y = 0;
00134  m_logo_rect.h = m_logo_rect.w = 0;
00135  
00136  if(mp_LogoBMP)
00137  {
00138   m_logo_rect.w = mp_LogoBMP->w;
00139   m_logo_rect.h = mp_LogoBMP->h;
00140   m_logo_rect.x = 160-m_logo_rect.w/2;
00141   m_logo_rect.y = 22;
00142  }
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 void CAbout::process()
00147 {  
00148  mp_Map->animateAllTiles();
00149  
00150  if(m_type == "ID")
00151  {
00152   mp_bmp->draw( g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, 160-mp_bmp->getWidth()/2, 22);
00153  }
00154  else if(m_type == "CG")
00155  {
00156   if(mp_LogoBMP)
00157    SDL_BlitSurface(mp_LogoBMP, NULL, g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, &m_logo_rect);
00158  }
00159 
00160  for(std::size_t i=0 ; i<m_lines.size() ; i++)
00161   g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont(g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, m_lines.at(i), 24, 72+i*8, true);
00162  
00163  if(g_pInput->getPressedAnyKey())
00164   m_destroy_me=true;
00165 }
00166 
00167 CAbout::~CAbout() {
00168  if(mp_LogoBMP) SDL_FreeSurface(mp_LogoBMP);
00169 }
